segments.source_content:
---
title: Getting Started
sidebar_label: Getting Started
---
There are two ways to integrate the Directory Sync within your application.

translations.zh-CN: 有两种方式可将目录同步功能集成到您的应用程序中。

segments.source_content: The advantage of running a separate service is that you get all of our UI tooling (like the Admin Portal) with the service. The disadvantage is that you have to manage the operations of a separate service.

translations.zh-CN: 运行独立服务的优势在于您能获得我们所有的UI工具（如管理门户），缺点是您需要额外管理该服务的运维工作。

segments.source_content: **If you are not using Node.js then this is the only option available to you.**

translations.zh-CN: **若您未使用Node.js开发，则这是唯一可选的集成方案。**

segments.source_content: Read more about [how to run the Jackson service](/docs/jackson/deploy/service)

translations.zh-CN: 了解更多关于[如何运行Jackson服务](/docs/jackson/deploy/service)

segments.source_content: Jackson use webhooks to notify your application any time changes are made to directory users and groups. You can use webhooks to trigger actions in your application, such as creating a new user in your application, or updating a user in your application based on the changes made in the directory.

translations.zh-CN: Jackson通过Webhook机制在目录用户或群组发生变更时通知您的应用程序。您可利用Webhook触发业务逻辑，例如根据目录变更在应用中创建新用户或更新现有用户。

segments.source_content: This is available if you are already developing your application using Node.js.

translations.zh-CN: 此方案仅适用于使用Node.js开发的应用程序。

segments.source_content:
The advantage of embedding Jackson as an NPM library is that you do not have to manage operations of a separate service.
The disadvantage is that you do not readily get our UI tooling (like the Admin Portal) with this method.

translations.zh-CN: 嵌入Jackson作为NPM库的优势在于无需维护独立服务，但缺点是无法直接使用我们的UI工具（如管理门户）。

segments.source_content: See the [API Reference](/docs/directory-sync/api-reference) to understand more about the available methods.

translations.zh-CN: 查阅[API参考文档](/docs/directory-sync/api-reference)了解可用方法详情。
